item.title: Building a Blog via Blogdown and Hugo
item.description: Intro This is a beginner’s tutorial to building a website through the R Package ‘Blogdown’ and Hugo. Install RStudio (https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/) and R (https://www.r-project.org/) to get started. Create an EMPTY directory (make sure it is empty besides the .Rproj file). Run the following commands in the console. Sometimes Blogdown will give you weird errors if you run this code in a newly created R script file, so avoid making any new files until the commands below are executed.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
